snippet: In taped interviews conducted by prosecutors and the police, Lamont Pride described the circumstances of the Dec. 12 shooting of Officer Peter J. Figoski.
abstract: Lamont Pride, in taped interviews conducted by prosecutors and police officers, describes the circumstances of the fatal shooting of New York City police officer Peter J Figoski in December 2011; Pride has pleaded not guilty.
lead_paragraph: In taped interviews conducted by prosecutors and the police, Lamont Pride described the circumstances of the Dec. 12 shooting of Officer Peter J. Figoski.

headline.seo: Suspect in Shooting of Officer Peter Figoski Offers His Account
headline.main: Suspect in Officer’s Death Offers Account of Shooting
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Officer’s Death Offers Account of Shooting
